reviews.text: The food is great and the place is nice. The sevice is so good
Great food and the service is amazing
Great food! Falafel platter and chickpea salad  are delicious

The plov is SO salty and completely soaked in oil, and the rice was dry. I’ve had my fair share of authentic plov in Central Asia and this just wasn’t it…I’d be willing to try this spot again for another dish but they really missed the mark on the plov sadly!
Grilled is exactly what the neighborhood was missing! Food was great and reasonably priced. There’s some outdoor seating, otherwise great for take out. We’ll definitely be back!
I absolutely love this place! I’m so happy they opened. The owner is soo nice. You can really tell they put great care into making delicious food. Seriously awesome

This new Mediterranean spot is the perfect place to get yourself fresh, authentic and delicious Mediterranean food!!!! Super clean, staff is amazing, price is great, and you get a lot for your money!!! Falafels are to die for, the kebab sandwiches are soooo good and you must try the grilled chicken Caesar wrap !!!!  Oh let me not forget the homemade sauces that are made fresh daily- sooo yummy!! All this right next to the best pizza in town
!! 2 of my favorite spots right next to each other !!!

I enjoyed both the pita falafel sandwich and the chicken platter. The vegetables were fresh, the chicken was moist and well-seasoned, and the falafel was crispy. The side salad was also fresh and good.
Falafel is incredible - crispy on outside soft on inside

I love this place. Everything‘s always fresh and delicious. Staff is very friendly quick to service and happy to please you with beautiful food and it’s right next to My Favorite Pl., Crown Heights Pizza.
Love this place fresh every time and it’s right next to my favorite Pizzeria Crown Heights Pizza
Delicious food! We got the Plov Platter and it very yummy
Great new kebab spot in the neighborhood! Lamb is delicious and the corn salad is great! Highly recommend

Got their sample Uzbekistan plov on their soft opening day for free. Food was oily but the rice and the meat was good. Gave it 4 stars as the ingredients (salad toppings) looked promising and would go back again to try other things.

Exciting addition to the neighborhood with surprising offerings like Uzbek plov - the ultimate comfort food. Owned by the same folks that run the ultra-popular pizza shop next door - great vote of quality. Tried the Plov, beet salad and the chicken kebab platter so far - everything is fresh and absolutely delicious.
